title: Was Kapila the first atheist? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kapila Maharishi made known the knowledge and Truth of the philosophy that is called "San(m)khya". Sankhya is not atheism. Sankhya is pure, unadulterated, finest and highest knowledge of this Creation ( actually Manifestation) from its point of beginning to its point of end. Where Sankhya stops, Advaita takes the baton.
He shouldn't be associated with the common Atheism philosophy.His schools of philosophies are more of close to Stoicism , which deals with material aspects of mind ,  body, and logic.
